title: Ticket #1382: Be able to do condor_submit_dag on a set of submit files, w/o DAG file
description:
It would probably be useful for people to be able to submit degenerate DAGs without actually creating a DAG file (just listing the submit files on the condor_submit_dag command line). (This would be useful in the case of people using DAGMan just for the throttling features.)

Maybe we could do something like this: 

  condor_submit_dag -sub A.sub B.sub C.sub ...
creator: wenger
